cd ${PKG_ROOT}
go run ${WORK}/main.go
cd ${WORK}
cmp stdout want.txt

-- main.go --
package main

import . "github.com/efd6/dispear"

func main() {
	DESCRIPTION("bytes")

	BYTES("binary", "src").IGNORE_MISSING(true)

	Generate()
}
-- want.txt --
---
description: bytes
processors:
  - bytes:
      tag: bytes_src_into_binary_28c6baea
      field: src
      target_field: binary
      ignore_missing: true
